text:
Liga
Real Madrid: tension between Carvajal and Vasquez
During a bull, the tension rose a notch between Dani Carvajal and Lucas Vasquez.
02 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Mourad Bennis



Real MadridA new era is opening in Madrid. After a white season, Casa Blanca has released heavy artillery to strengthen this summer. What compete with Bar√ßa in Liga and glimpse a umpteenth Champions League.Icon Sport



Thibaut CourtoisIcon Sport



Ferland MendyIcon Sport



Sergio RamosIcon Sport



Rapha√´l VaraneIcon Sport



Dani CarvajalIcon Sport



Toni Kroos



CasemiroIcon Sport



Luka ModricIcon Sport



Eden HazardIcon Sport



Karim BenzemaIcon Sport



Vinicius JrIcon Sport

Real Madrid: the eleven possible for the season




It was a priori harmless contact. And yet, Lucas Vasquez did not like the tackle of Dani Carvajal during a bull. Sergio Ramos tried to calm things down between the two men.




Carvajal and Vasquez take action during a training




Real Madrid + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The bull game, much appreciated by players generally, caused a surprising dispute between Lucas Vasquez and Dani Carvajal. The first city reproaches the second tackle too much against him. Result: invectives exchanged between the two men for several minutes. Nevertheless, Sergio Ramos has calmed the ardor of his teammates.
